common.description: Enter a GitHub, GitLab, or Bitbucket repository URL, or a local folder path, to generate a wiki.

loading.preparingDownload: Please wait while we prepare your download...

home.whichRepoQuestion: Which repo would you like to understand?
home.searchPlaceholder: Search for repositories (or paste a link)

form.comprehensiveDescription: Detailed wiki with structured sections and more pages
form.conciseDescription: Simplified wiki with fewer pages and essential information
form.addTokens: + Add access tokens for private repositories
form.tokenSecurityNote: Token is stored in memory only and never persisted.
form.defaultFiltersInfo: Default filters include common directories like node_modules, .git, and common build artifact files.
form.excludedDirsHelp: One directory path per line. Paths starting with ./ are relative to repository root.
form.enterExcludedDirs: Enter excluded directories, one per line...
form.excludedFilesHelp: One filename per line. Wildcards (*) are supported.
form.enterExcludedFiles: Enter excluded files, one per line...
form.defaultNote: These defaults are already applied. Add your custom exclusions above.

error.invalidRepo: Invalid repository format. Use "owner/repo", a full Git URL, or local path.

ask.placeholder: Ask a question about this repository...

repoPage.errorMessageDefault: Please check that your repository exists and is public. Valid formats are "owner/repo", "https://github.com/owner/repo", "https://gitlab.com/owner/repo", "https://bitbucket.org/owner/repo", or local folder paths like "C:\\path\\to\\folder" or "/path/to/folder".
repoPage.selectPagePrompt: Select a page from the navigation to view its content
